snippet.title: The Right Shot - Internship Project - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
As the new waiter of the evil bar The Right Shot, your job is to serve cocktails to the bar's customers. The bartender is bombarding you with colourful cocktails… Catch them, throw them: whatever it takes to serve them quickly! 

🍹 Play it now for free here: https://thegamebakers.itch.io/the-right-shot

The Right Shot was made during a five-month internship at The Game Bakers by Maya Hill, Leelou Puech, and Louise Jandot Dit Danjou, mentored by The Game Bakers' team.

The game is free, but you can give more and all the money raised will go to Secours Populaire. The charity supports people who are victims of social injustice, poverty, hunger, and armed conflicts.❤️

- - -
The Game Bakers, 
Creators of Furi, Haven, Squids.
http://www.thegamebakers.com/haven/
Join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/thegamebakers
